shows.title: Subliminal Communication / Astrological Energy
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and former criminalist Eldon Taylor is considered an expert in preconscious and subliminal information processing. He will discuss his research into human potential, limitations, expectations, and what is deemed reasonable. He will also talk about communication and hypnosis.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Astrologer and author Carmen Turner-Schott will speak about the power of astrology, including the signs, planets, and houses, and explain how everyone can learn to harness astrological energy in their own lives. Carmen will reveal the energy and personality traits of each sign of the zodiac.

shows.title: The Mars Craze / Meditation & Metaphysics
shows.first_half: First Half: Award-winning journalist, broadcaster, and author David Baron will present his research into America’s enduring fascination with Mars and Martians, and will share what he has discovered and uncovered about the "Mars Craze" at the turn of the last century, when some astronomers became convinced that Mars was home to an advanced civilization.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author RJ Spina will discuss meditation and the various techniques that can be used. He'll explain what meditation truly is and why it is so beneficial, as well as reveal the secret metaphysics of how to manifest what you desire.

shows.title: Manson Murders / Haunted Civil War Sites
shows.first_half: First Half: Investigative reporter Mark Shaw will discuss the Manson "family" murders case in context with the similarities and differences regarding justice with the JFK & RFK assassinations, and the death of journalist Dorothy Kilgallen. He'll address the question of whether Manson received a fair trial.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Paranormal researcher and haunted tour founder Courtney McInvale will discuss Civil War history through a haunted lens, including key Southern battlegrounds. She'll also share some of her most formative early paranormal experiences, including when Ed and Lorraine Warren investigated her childhood home.

shows.title: Public Health / The Alien Perspective
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Tom Frieden has served as Director of the CDC and as Commissioner of the NYC Health Department. He'll discuss ways to distinguish fact from fiction when it comes to health advice and explore public health programs that have saved millions of lives.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Filmmaker Dean Alioto will delve into the UFO phenomenon from the alien perspective. He'll portray this unique point-of-view and how he interacted with experts at NASA, France’s space program, and the Carl Sagan Institute. He'll also cover topics including non-human intelligence downloads to humans, and how these craft may actually be traveling in the astral plane.

shows.title: The Human Mind / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Scientist, healer, and entertainer Dr. Reef Karim believes our current culture is toxic to our own self-expression and to finding personal meaning in the world. He joins guest host Lisa Garr (email) to tell some funny stories, entertain us, and educate us on how the human mind works and why we all have a mad genius living inside of us, but for most people, that genius is in hibernation, stuck under a whole bunch of societal programming. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Lisa a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
